EDUCATION.Institute Name: Birla Institute of Technology and Science

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Digit drawn using laser light recorded and processed into an image. The image was further processes to be fed into the digit recognition neural network. The neural network was trained using an available database.

1.Surface Reconstruction Using Marching Cubes Algorithms
2.Generation Of Curves And Surfaces Of revolution 
3.Symmetric Graph Drawing In OpenGL 
4.Interactive 3-d Scene Creation
Designed an interface to record information regarding inventory and employees of over 200 branches from across the country and analyse the same.

Built a recommender system that keeps track of mails, favorite websites and important documents. The system extracted events from multiple email ids, websites like "bookmyshow.com" and other unstructured data sources like PDF documents.

Language: Python
Library and API: BeautifulSoup, Pdfminer, Google Calendar API
The project implements an optimized version of FP-growth algorithm for mining useful rules in various databases.
Built a windows desktop application for an address book with speech recognition functionalities and bi lingual support.
Built an application to automate the voting and counting procedure for elections at BITS Pilani Hyderabad Campus. The application was used for Students' Union elections by almost 1500 students.

HONOR & AWARD.Title: Republic Day Parade from the Prime Minister's Box
